remarks: Well-founded induction restricted to a set ( ` A e. _V ` ).  The proof has been taken from Chapter 4 of Don Monk's notes on Set Theory.  See ~ http://euclid.colorado.edu/~~monkd/setth.pdf .  (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)

$d A x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d ph y $.
